div.p: This case-insensitive code system http://tecnomod-um.org/CodeSystem/swallow-screen-time-cs defines the following code:

tr.td: Screening performed within 4 hours of symptom onset.

description.value:
Local CodeSystem that categorizes when a swallowing screening occurred relative to stroke onset/admission.
**Primary use-case** - Support process metrics such as “screening completed within 4 hours”.
**FHIR placement** - Used as a CodeableConcept in a Procedure extension (`SwallowingScreeningTimingCategoryExt`).

definition.value: Screening performed within 4 hours of symptom onset.
